short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy cookies to clipboard to use with some API tools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A handy Chrome extension that copies cookies in the correct format for easy use in applications like Insomnia and Postman. Simplify your API testing and development workflow by quickly transferring session data with just one click!
